ajk.consul4spring

Class DnsResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ajk.consul4spring.DnsResolver

  • @Component
public class DnsResolver
extends java.lang.Object
    a convenient way to resolve SRV records in a DNS

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      DnsResolver() 

    • Method Summary

      java.lang.String readNonLoopbackLocalAddress()
      read the local real IP address (not the loopback address)

      resolves an A record by its name using a specified DNS host and port
      java.lang.String resolveServiceByName(java.lang.String name)
      resolves an SRV record by its name and the default resolution defined at the host level

    • Constructor Detail

      • DnsResolver

        public DnsResolver()

    • Method Detail

      • resolveServiceByName

        public java.lang.String resolveServiceByName(java.lang.String name)
        resolves an SRV record by its name and the default resolution defined at the host level
        Parameters:
        name - the DNS name of the SRV record
        Returns:
        a comma separate list of ip:port, e.g: 1.2.3.4:8080,2.3.4.5:9090 or null when unable to resolve

      • resolveHostByName

        public java.lang.String resolveHostByName(java.lang.String resolverHost,
                                          int resolverPort,
                                          java.lang.String name)
        resolves an A record by its name using a specified DNS host and port
        Parameters:
        resolverHost - name server hostname or IP address
        resolverPort - name server port
        name - the DNS name of the A record - the name to resolve
        Returns:
        a comma separated list of IP addresses or an empty string when unable to resolve

      • reverseLookupByAddress

        public java.lang.String reverseLookupByAddress(java.lang.String resolverHost,
                                               int resolverPort,
                                               java.net.InetAddress address)
        reverse lookup an IP address using a specified DNS host and port
        Parameters:
        resolverHost - name server hostname or IP address
        resolverPort - name server port
        address - the IP address to reverse lookup
        Returns:
        a comma separated list of names or an empty string when unable to resolve

      • resolveServiceByName

        public java.lang.String resolveServiceByName(java.lang.String resolverHost,
                                             int resolverPort,
                                             java.lang.String name)
        resolves an SRV record by its name using a specified DNS host and port
        Parameters:
        resolverHost - name server hostname or IP address
        resolverPort - name server port
        name - the DNS name of the SRV record
        Returns:
        a comma separate list of ip:port, e.g: 1.2.3.4:8080,2.3.4.5:9090 or null when unable to resolve

      • readNonLoopbackLocalAddress

        public java.lang.String readNonLoopbackLocalAddress()
        read the local real IP address (not the loopback address)
        Returns:
        the real IP address, or the loopback address when no real one could be found
